page.title: 18OUR FAMILY'S SATURDAY.
page.content: On Saturdays I go to Sunderland,to watch football.I meet my friends in Stanley and we catch the bus from the bus station. When we get to Sunderland we go straight to Roker Park. The bus picks you up after the match, and takes you back to Stanley. It costs Â£1 bus fare and Â£1.50 into the ground. On Saturdays my dad puts his pigeons in a race. He gets up at 7 am, goes to the pigeon cree, he puts his best pigeons into a basket which is loaded onto the transporter. The transporter comes to the Punch Bowl,Craghead and takes the pigeons to places like Brighton, Eastbourne, Southampton, Portsmouth and Dover. My mam usually stays in the house until 1 pm to make the dinner.She then goes shopping to Fine Fare, Stanley.My sister goes with her. The family watch television all night.
